pipals fedayinaya, ho adu tharamin ehi nayakathwaye bahutharaya, eki ka්riya margayama yoda ganimin thunde pakshayath samanga sanyojanaya wimata katayuthu kaloya. 1980 juniye di nawa palana thantha්rayata erehiwa “sannaddha aragalayak” diyath kala, sulu dhanapathi bahujana anugamikathwayakin yuth “islamiya samajawadi” kandayamak wu pipals mujahedinaya, 1979 dina waladi wiplawayata komeyinigen lada “nayakathwaya” pilibanda aacharaya pala kaleya.

pudabime abhinawayen idi kerunu shripada anuruwa shripathula pihituwa saghasathu kota puja kara bathimathunge namaskaraya sandaha wiwrutha kirima, dinamina puwathpatha ha lanka bankuwa ekwa idiripath kala “ uththama sathkara puja sara sangrahaye ” piliganwima, palmadulla pothgul ubhaya wihara wasi maha sangharathnaye saya namak wetha shishyathwa piliganwima, pradeshaye duwa daruwan panas denekuta pasal upakarana beda dima saha dana sila bhawanamaya pinkam rasak medina wiharastha pudabimedi pawathwini.rathnapura maha disawe pradhana sanghanayaka, palmadulla - pothgul ubhaya wiharadhipathi ha shri padasthanadhipathi bengamuwe shri rathanapala dhammadinna nayaka swamindrayan wahansege anushasakathwayen ha wiharastha dayaka karakadhinge sanwidhayakathwayen pawathi mema pinkam sadaha bathibara madhya sathkaraya lekhawus aayathanaya ha jathika rupawahiniyeni.
amma sema thaththada api wenuwen helu kandulu kopamana wiya hakida?
